name: A Night for Flesh and Roses
name_original: A Night for Flesh and Roses
description:
current short demo build!

Things to note: right clicking for rotating pieces in character builder rotates All the pieces, im hoping to fix this for the next iteration

occasionally, the character animations may become unsynced from their transparent layer mask, this usually goes away by the time the next animation loads or can reset if you go back a couple passages and then forward to reload the animation

UI and other things are still being ironed out, this demo is mostly proof of concept and a place to continue forward from

Now the fun stuff!

A Night for Flesh and Roses is a visual novel where you find yourself in a strange, organic, body-horror castle full of people who are similarly freaks. In this far future, augmenting and changing the body is so normalized that most look unrecognizable as human. In addition, the body is constantly in flux, allowing people to change their form at will including you. Learn about this strange place while also having sexual tension with a cast of weirdos (affectionately)!
